channel.title: Need Help Wit CMDS
channel.description:
i have satan isle, where do i go to make new cmds?
other 1 got timed - out so im in more hurry
thx all ;)
Also if ur a ok or w/e coder..add DarkAgeScape TO: Hamachi Pass:123 Im also looking for co-owner/host[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 02:52:29 PM[/size][hr]IM also looking for help for NPC dialog...but i REALLY need CMDs for now thx m8s

item.title: Need Help Wit CMDS
item.dc:creator: @funtwo funtwo
item.description:
@funtwo wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(392, 1000000); addItem(3801, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 0); addSkillXP(1000, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 2); sendMessage("Yarr this be getting you through your trubles !"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You be a greedy bastard and shall walk the plank !"); } }

thers the starter command(its not called starter in satans isle)
under the last } try typing this but remember first to make a backup incase this doesnt work

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("blkt")) { addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); } }

####=blk t id

did it work?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Wit CMDS
item.dc:creator: @funtwo funtwo
item.description:
@funtwo wrote:

go into ur client.java and search for starter until you find the starter command

it will say stuff like addItem(995, 1000000);

then just add ur new commands under the last { under the starter comand
